title: Android 12L Beta 3 now available for Lenovo P12 Pro
content:
At the start of March, Android 12L rolled out to Pixel phones and AOSP, while updates for Samsung and Microsoft devices are planned for this year. Lenovo is also on that list and yesterday released Android 12L Beta 3 for the Lenovo P12 Pro.

moreâ€¦

The post Android 12L Beta 3 now available for Lenovo P12 Pro appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Following the AOSP and Pixel launch at the start of this month, Lenovo yesterday released Android 12L Beta 3 for the Lenovo P12 Pro...
